job_details.full_text:
Generative AI Engineer

As a Generative AI engineer you will lead the development of generative AI solutions within Vopak. The purpose is to make information in unstructured data like documents more easily accessible. We envision generative AI as tool which will support employees in three ways:

   To drive this development, you will work on

profile_classification.rationale: The job description explicitly states 'Generative AI Engineer' and focuses on developing generative AI solutions to make unstructured data accessible. It mentions supporting employees with generative AI, which aligns with building user-facing applications. While specific technologies are not detailed in this snippet, the core focus on 'generative AI solutions' and 'making information in unstructured data accessible' strongly points to the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'lead the development of generative AI solutions' directly relates to creating and implementing AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: lead the development of generative AI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The purpose 'to make information in unstructured data like documents more easily accessible' describes understanding and addressing a business need through AI.
job_tasks.phrase: make information in unstructured data like documents more easily accessible

job_tasks.justification: The vision 'generative AI as tool which will support employees' indicates an understanding of how the technology will be used within the business context.
job_tasks.phrase: generative AI as tool which will support employees
